title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus is not transferred to the Combo.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus should be transferred to the Combo.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog. 
2. Press the "Tab" key and confirm that the focus goes to the second Combo "Repository Path:".
